description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is looking to lease one Wide-Format Multifunction Device and two Large Format Printers.  These devices will be used for various purposes within the Department.  SSC is responsible for the supply, delivery, installation,testing and training of the devices. full_summary:
=====================================

### 2BP2-113401: Wideformat Multifunction Device and Large-Format Printers for Department of National Defence

### General Invitation to Tender
---------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the lease of a wideformat multifunction device and two large format printers.

### Essential Tender Information
---------------------------------

*   **Tender ID**: SSC-22-00020441:T-2BP2-113401
*   **Notice Date:** 2022-10-17
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-25 1400 hours (Eastern Time)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Equipment Requirement
------------------------

DND requires the supply, delivery, and installation of:

1.  One wideformat multifunction device
2.  Two large format printers

Additionally, the contractor must provide necessary training to users in English to access all equipment features.

### Selection Criteria and Evaluation Methodology
---------------------------------------------------

The selection process will evaluate proposals based on the contractor's capability to supply, deliver, and install the required equipment and provide the necessary training.

### Attachments and Supporting Documents
----------------------------------------

Proposal packages, including bid forms, MUST be downloaded from the SSC Portal (https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/). The attachment potions includes additional supporting documentation for this tender announcement.

### Important Contact Information
----------------------------------

Contract inquiries may be directed to Katherine Ikenson, Contract Specialist, SSC. Please contact Katherine by email at [katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca) or phone at 613-298-2147.

### Notification of Amendment
---------------------------

This solicitation is subject to the amendment issued on 2022-11-22. Interested contractors must review this amendment in conjunction with the initial notice.

### Delivery Location
----------------------

The contract will be performed at various locations in the province of New Brunswick.
